text: Di godou madagoaa ma ga hagaonge, goodou e bida hagahuaidu hua goodou, e pala iha godou libogo gi lala loo, gadoo be di aalek dela ma gaa biga, gei goodou gaa holo godou gahu lodo huaidu, ga haga nonnono godou luaahi gi no lodo, gaa lawa ga kiikii i lodo nia luaahi. E hai behee? Goodou e hagamaanadu bolo deelaa go di hai o di hagaonge? Goodou e hagamaanadu bolo Au e hiihai gi di hagadilinga dela beenei?
